index.html.title: About The Project | Core Framework
index.html.keywords: ' Report Bug or Request Feature About The Project Documentation Framework that contains useful Modules to be Used in Unity Project. Built With V2021.3.5f1 Installation To install this into your project for modifications Clone or Download the code from Git Hub into your project. Check Out Third Party Notices for additional assets that where used in this project that you can get from the asset store. Roadmap See the open issues for a list of proposed features (and known issues). License Distributed under the MIT License. See for more information. Tabbed content Tab group 1: Tab Text 1 Tab Text 2 Tab content-1-1. Tab content-2-1. Tab group 2: Tab Text A Tab Text B Tab content-a-1. Tab content-b-1. Tab group 3: Tab Text 1 Tab Text 2 Tab content-1-1. Tab content-2-1. Tab group 4: Tab Text A Tab Text B Tab content-a-2. Tab content-b-2. Behavior Tab groups with a same set of id are linkable in one page. In example, tab group 1, 3 have same id set: tabid-1, tabid-2, tab group 2, 4 have same id set: tabid-a, tabid-b. So tab group 1, 3 are linked, tab group 2, 4 are linked. When tab tabid-1 in tab group 1 is clicked, tab tabid-1 in tab group 3 will be selected in same time. But tab group 2, 4 do not have any changed. Condition Condition is the tab id of other table groups. Tab Group 5: Tab Text 5 Tab Text6 Tab content-5. Tab content-6. Tab Group 6: Tab Text C Tab Text C Tab Text D Tab Text D Tab content-c for 5. Tab content-C for 6. Tab content-D for 5. Tab content-D for 6. Video Allows you to add videos to your topics.

License/Asset Licenses.html.title: Asset Licenses | Core Framework
License/Asset Licenses.html.keywords: Asset Licenses Restricted Asset The publisher has designated this as a Restricted Asset under Section 2.2.2 of the Asset Store EULA. Specifically, the publisher added the following restrictions: END USER may not monetize this Asset in an application whose primary purpose is to create user-generated content. ( Metaverse) END USER may not incorporate the Asset into a product whose primary purpose is to enable the minting and exchange of non-fungible tokens. Extension Asset One license required for each individual user. Single Entity License applies to a single entity. Contractors are required to have their own, separate license. Multi Entity License applies to an entity as well as parent, child, and sister entities. Contractors working on a project do not need a separate license. For more information, check the EULA and FAQ .

Manual/MixamoAnimations.html.title: Mixamo Animations | Core Framework
Manual/MixamoAnimations.html.keywords: Mixamo Animations Important All Animations and Models found in the Mixamo Folder can be obtained for free from Mixamo Tip There are plenty of Animations available to get you started both with and without root motion. Are Mecanim Compatible. https://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/Animator.MatchTarget.html Import Settings: Rig Import Settings Animation Settings Non Repeat Animations Animation Settings Repeat Animations All Rigs are set to Humanoid abd generate their own For all in place ("No Root Motion or treadmill") that Play once and do not continuously repeat etc. Attack Animations. I have used the following settings: Tip "Bake Into Pose" is to ensure that if the animation contains any root motion in it will not affect the transform of your character. For all in place ("No Root Motion or treadmill") that continuously repeat et. Idle, Walk, or Run animations. I have used the following settings: Tip "Bake Into Pose" is to ensure that if the animation contains any root motion in it will not affect the transform of your character. See Below How the different Settings Effect the animation and how smooth it plays.
